subject: Public Speaking
title: Spaced Repetition in Speeches
description: A 1-minute de-risking session on Spaced Repetition in Speeches.

hook.text: Say it once, they might hear. Say it three times, they remember.

buildup.text: Repeat key messages at intervals throughout the speech.

discovery.text: Each repetition should add new context, not just echo.

twist.text: Advertisers use this. Teachers use this. Speakers should too.

climax.text: The most remembered speeches use strategic repetition.

quiz.question: How should key messages be repeated?
options: At intervals with added context each time
